string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Gossip Girl is based on the book series, it is written by Cecily von Ziegesar."
"The character of Lily van der Woodsen was originally named Darla, writers changed it at the last moment."
"Leighton Meester had to dye her naturally blonde hair brunette merely to audition for the role of Blair Waldorf."
"Every episode title is a word play on the title of a movie, book or TV show."
"Originally, Georgina Sparks was offered to Mischa Barton, who turned down the role. Michelle Trachtenberg was then cast as Georgina Sparks."
"\"I'm not maternal! I've just been spending too much time with Cyrus and I'm turning Jewish.\" - Blair"
"2008 - Teen Choice Awards, Best Drama (Winner)"
"Taylor has the same birthday as The Rolling Stones' Mick Jagger."
"Taylor loves movies, singing and dancing."
"Taylor's favorite school subject is chemistry."
"Taylor loves the bands Garbage and the Black Eyed Peas."
"Blake dated actor Kelly Blatz for 3 years from 2004 to 2007."
"As a teenager, Blake was a huge fan of Justin Timberlake and Leonardo DiCaprio."
"Blake is right-handed."
"Blake has confirmed that she is dating Gossip Girl co-star Penn Badgley, whom she has known since she was 11."
"Blake is the youngest of the four leads in The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants."
"Blake attended Burbank High School in Burbank, California."
"Blake loves going to Disneyland. "
"Blake: \"I can't believe we're being paid to live in New York\"."
"Blake is the sister-in-law of Bart Johnson."
"Blake: \"My whole family's been in the business. My whole family is crazy\"."
"Leighton Meester's first experience in acting came when she was 11, while she was growing up in Marco Island, Florida."
"Leighton is one of the few people who refers to Ed Westwick as /"Eddy/"."
"Leighton Meester is naturally blonde but dyed her hair brown for the role of Blair Waldorf on Gossip Girl."
"Leighton's favorite song is "Out On The Weekend" by Neil Young."
"Penn Badgley's hobbies include singing, writing, and playing the guitar. "
"Penn's favorite sports are surfing, skiing and snowboarding."
"Penn Badgley began acting while growing up in Seattle, Washington"
"Badgley made his on-screen debut on a 1999 episode of Will&Grace."
"Before Chace broke into the acting business, he was a valet. He admits to stealing customer's gum while on the job."
"Besides getting married, Chace would love to fly a plane before he dies."
"Chace's worst habit is that he doesn't clean his dishes."
"Edward Westwick is the lead singer of the band The Filthy Youth."
"'American Psycho' is Edward's favorite film, and he usually watches it with 'Gossip Girl' co-star Chace Crawford. "
"Jessica:\"Jeans and T-shirts is pretty much what I like. And flip-flops\"."
"Jessica did print modeling for Kohl's Department Store during high school."
"Kelly gave birth to her first child, Herm√©s Gustaf Daniel Giersch on October 2006."
"When Kelly was 17, she moved to California by herself, where she began a career as a TV actress."
"Matthew Settle moved to New York City at age 18 to pursue an acting career."
"Settle has a daughter with his former wife, Israeli actress Naama Nativ."
